00056     define('PRAY_FLAG_ZLIB_COMPRESSED',1);

00060 abstract class PrayBlock {
00062     
00063     private $prayfile;
00064     private $content;
00065     private $name;
00066     private $type;
00067     private $decompiled;

00081     public function PrayBlock($prayfile,$name,$content,$flags,$type) {
00082         if(strlen($type) != 4) {
00083             throw new Exception('Invalid PRAY block type: '.$type);
00084         }
00085         if($prayfile instanceof PRAYFile) {
00086             $this->prayfile = $prayfile;
00087             $this->decompiled = false;
00088         } else {
00089             $this->prayfile = null;
00090             $this->decompiled = true;
00091         }
00092         $this->name = $name;
00093         $this->content = $content;
00094         $this->flags = $flags;
00095         $this->type = $type;
00096     }
00098     
00104     protected function EncodeBlockHeader($length,$uncompressedlength=false) {
00105         $compiled = $this->GetType();
00106         $compiled .= substr($this->GetName(),0,128);
00107         $len = 128 - strlen($this->GetName());
00108         fwrite(STDERR, $len);
00109         for($i=0;$i<$len;$i++) {
00110             $compiled .= pack('x');
00111         }
00112         if($uncompressedlength === false) {
00113             $uncompressedlength = $length;
00114         }
00115         $compiled .= pack('VVV',$length,$uncompressedlength,$this->flags);
00116         return $compiled;
00117     }
00118     
00120 
00122 
00127     protected function PerformFlagOperations($data) {
00128         if($this->IsFlagSet(PRAY_FLAG_ZLIB_COMPRESSED)) {
00129             $data = gzcompress($data);
00130         }
00131         return $data;
00132     }
00133 
00135     
00137 
00139     public function GetName() {
00140         return $this->name;
00141     }
00143 
00148     public function GetData() {
00149         if($this->decompiled) {
00150             throw new Exception('Can\'t get data on a decompiled PRAYBlock. It must be compiled first');
00151             return;
00152         }
00153         if($this->IsFlagSet(PRAY_FLAG_ZLIB_COMPRESSED)) {
00154             $this->content = gzuncompress($this->content);
00155             $this->SetFlagsOff(PRAY_FLAG_ZLIB_COMPRESSED);
00156         }
00157         return $this->content;
00158     }
00160 
00165     public function GetType() {
00166         return $this->type;
00167     }
00169 
00174     public function GetFlags() {
00175         return $this->flags;
00176     }
00178 
00182     public function IsFlagSet($flag) {
00183         return (($this->flags & $flag) === $flag);
00184     }
00185     
00187 
00189 
00193     protected function GetLength() {
00194         return strlen($this->content);
00195     }
00197 
00201     protected function SetData($data) {
00202         $this->content = $data;
00203     }
00205      * @returns a PRAYFile object.
00206      */
00207     protected function GetPrayFile() {
00208         return $this->prayfile;
00209     }
00211 
00214     protected function SetFlagsOn($flags) {
00215         $this->flags = $this->flags | $flags;
00216     }
00218 
00221     protected function SetFlagsOff($flags) {
00222         $this->flags = $this->flags & ~$flags;
00223                 
00224     }
00226 
00229     protected function EnsureDecompiled() {
00230         if($this->decompiled) {
00231             return;
00232         } else {
00233             $this->DecompileBlockData();
00234         }
00235     }
00236 
00238     // Started above GetLength.

00241 
00246     public function Compile() {
00247         if($this->decompiled) { 
00248             $data = $this->CompileBlockData();
00249             $uclength = strlen($data);
00250             $data = $this->PerformFlagFunctions($data);
00251             $compile = $this->EncodeBlockHeader(strlen($data),$uclength);
00252             $compiled .= $data;
00253             $this->content = $data;
00254             $this->decompiled = false;
00255             return $compiled; 
00256         } else {
00257             $data = $this->PerformFlagFunctions($this->content);
00258             $compiled  = $this->EncodeBlockHeader(strlen($this->content),strlen($data));
00259             $compiled .= $this->content;
00260             return $compiled;
00261         }
00262     }
00263

00278     protected abstract function DecompileBlockData();

00289     public static function MakePrayBlock($blocktype,PRAYFile $prayfile,$name,$content,$flags) {
00290         switch($blocktype) {
00291             //agents
00292             case PRAY_BLOCK_AGNT:
00293                 return new AGNTBlock($prayfile,$name,$content,$flags);
00294             case PRAY_BLOCK_DSAG:
00295                 return new DSAGBlock($prayfile,$name,$content,$flags);
00296             case PRAY_BLOCK_LIVE:
00297                 return new LIVEBlock($prayfile,$name,$content,$flags); //sea monkeys agent files.
00298 
00299             //egg
00300             case PRAY_BLOCK_EGGS:
00301                 return new EGGSBlock($prayfile,$name,$content,$flags);
00302 
00303             //starter families
00304             case PRAY_BLOCK_DFAM:
00305                 return new DFAMBlock($prayfile,$name,$content,$flags);
00306             case PRAY_BLOCK_SFAM:
00307                 return new SFAMBlock($prayfile,$name,$content,$flags);
00308         
00309             //exported creatures
00310             case PRAY_BLOCK_EXPC:
00311                 return new EXPCBlock($prayfile,$name,$content,$flags);
00312             case PRAY_BLOCK_DSEX:
00313                 return new DSEXBlock($prayfile,$name,$content,$flags);
00314 
00315             case PRAY_BLOCK_CREA:
00316                 return new CREABlock($prayfile,$name,$content,$flags);
00317 
00318             //creature photos
00319             case PRAY_BLOCK_PHOT:
00320                 return new PHOTBlock($prayfile,$name,$content,$flags);
00321 
00322             //creature history
00323             case PRAY_BLOCK_GLST:
00324                 return new GLSTBlock($prayfile,$name,$content,$flags);
00325 
00326             //creature genetics
00327             case PRAY_BLOCK_GENE:
00328                 return new GENEBlock($prayfile,$name,$content,$flags);
00329     
00330             //files
00331             case PRAY_BLOCK_FILE:
00332                 return new FILEBlock($prayfile,$name,$content,$flags);
00333 
00334             default:
00335                 return null;
00336         }
00337     }
00339 }
